mods.note: The Bowman-Turnbull Family Papers consist of personal, financial, and legal documents pertaining to the business activities and, to a lesser degree, the personal lives of the Bowman and Turnbull families. Business papers include correspondence, invoices, receipts and accounts reflecting their involvement in the cotton and sugar trade. The papers of Catherine Rucker Turnbull, Daniel Turnbull, and James P. Bowman comprise a large portion of this group. Personal papers contain family letters and genealogical sketches.
mods.abstract: The Bowman-Turnbull Family Papers consist of personal, financial, and legal documents pertaining to the business activities and, to a lesser degree, the personal lives of the Bowman and Turnbull families.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
